item.title: RT by @fede_intern: I think this is correct and decoupling without trust is hard. The current favourite for a workaround for this centralising force seems to be leaning on preconfirmations with gateways, a la mev-boost relays.
item.dc:creator: @OrestTa
item.description: I think this is correct and decoupling without trust is hard. The current favourite for a workaround for this centralising force seems to be leaning on preconfirmations with gateways, a la mev-boost relays.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: rollup stacks: trying to solve fragmentation
shared sequencers/interop initiatives: trying to solve the fragmentation created by those who try to solve fragmentation by creating new fragmentation
based sequencing: cleaning up everybody's mess
item.dc:creator: @Junger0x
item.description:
rollup stacks: trying to solve fragmentation

shared sequencers/interop initiatives: trying to solve the fragmentation created by those who try to solve fragmentation by creating new fragmentation

based sequencing: cleaning up everybody's mess

item.title:
I like the zk shared bridge but if native goes live and you have based rollups with preconfirmations working (not difficult to do, native needs coordination) you have decentralized very fast rollups without multisigs and security council and great interops between L1 and other L2s.
If you want ZK you only will need to prove with a RISCV zkVM an L1 client + all the addons you want and with based native rollups and preconfirmations you will have the best of both worlds.
In less than 18 months this will become the default for rollups. Infra is gonna be commoditized and at the end it will be all customer acquisition.
I’m gonna explain the technical details in another tweet.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
I like the zk shared bridge but if native goes live and you have based rollups with preconfirmations working (not difficult to do, native needs coordination) you have decentralized very fast rollups without multisigs and security council and great interops between L1 and other L2s.

If you want ZK you only will need to prove with a RISCV zkVM an L1 client + all the addons you want and with based native rollups and preconfirmations you will have the best of both worlds.

In less than 18 months this will become the default for rollups. Infra is gonna be commoditized and at the end it will be all customer acquisition.

I’m gonna explain the technical details in another tweet.

nitter.freedit.eu/gluk64/status/1886081916580872429#m

item.title:
Since tech has no motto I believe this is incorrect. People are switching to deepseek, even microsoft is offering it in its cloud when chatgpt is an important investment for them, even if chatgpt has better distribution. X and Google have better distribution than chatgpt, nevertheless chatgpt has more adoption.
With RISCV zkVMs the comparison will be easier and people will switch one for another one if what you can save is relevant enough. That’s why whales use cowswap rather than uniswap. Cowswap had a better product. With a RISCV zkVm you have no differentiator apart from performance and security.
People will make money otherwise. ZK as AI LLMs have a raise to the bottom. You make money by building wrappers and things on top.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Since tech has no motto I believe this is incorrect. People are switching to deepseek, even microsoft is offering it in its cloud when chatgpt is an important investment for them, even if chatgpt has better distribution. X and Google have better distribution than chatgpt, nevertheless chatgpt has more adoption.

With RISCV zkVMs the comparison will be easier and people will switch one for another one if what you can save is relevant enough. That’s why whales use cowswap rather than uniswap. Cowswap had a better product. With a RISCV zkVm you have no differentiator apart from performance and security.

People will make money otherwise. ZK as AI LLMs have a raise to the bottom. You make money by building wrappers and things on top.

item.title:
Freedom! Freedom! Freedom! Hear the sound of broken chains, See noble equality enthroned.
From the new champions their faces Mars himself seems to inspire, And the gleam of their weapons Inspires great courage as well.
Come, O people, take heart! Victory crowns us at last! Let us swear with glory to die, Let us swear with glory to die!
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Freedom! Freedom! Freedom!
Hear the sound of broken chains,
See noble equality enthroned.

From the new champions their faces
Mars himself seems to inspire,
And the gleam of their weapons
Inspires great courage as well.

Come, O people, take heart!
Victory crowns us at last!
Let us swear with glory to die,
Let us swear with glory to die!

item.title: List of some of the people I respect and like the most in crypto. I don’t agree every time with them and that’s why I like watching their talks and I like reading their accounts. They make me question myself and my beliefs. - @VitalikButerin - @sreeramkannan - @aeyakovenko - @musalbas - @drakefjustin - @EliBenSasson - @CryptoHayes - @LynAldenContact - @ercwl
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
List of some of the people I respect and like the most in crypto. I don’t agree every time with them and that’s why I like watching their talks and I like reading their accounts. They make me question myself and my beliefs.
- @VitalikButerin
- @sreeramkannan
- @aeyakovenko
- @musalbas
- @drakefjustin

item.title:
I will be more clear: I believe @titanbuilderxyz is doing things correctly. I still need to study and learn more about alternatives but I like the fast engineering solution first to then complicate things.
Based rollups are going to be faster than Solana. I’m writing a thread about it in the plane.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern

Based rollups are going to be faster than Solana. I’m writing a thread about it in the plane.

item.title: Based rollups and preconfirmations are easy to implement. We need to start with an MVP. Many teams are doing good work but it’s too theoretical and protocol like. We need to start with simple iterations and go to production asap.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description: Based rollups and preconfirmations are easy to implement. We need to start with an MVP. Many teams are doing good work but it’s too theoretical and protocol like. We need to start with simple iterations and go to production asap.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: Eigenlayer: taking crypto mainstream! ————————- Earnifi The #5 Finance App in the App Store. @OpacityNetwork ♾️ @eigenlayer ————————- Problem I am a regular worker and want an advance. ————————- Today Predatory pay day loans ————————- Solution Prove to the lender that the borrower receives x wages regularly (=genuine) ————————- Unlock Opacity provides powerful primtives for anyone to prove arbitrary claims about their bank account with privacy! ————————- Community This is made possible by the never-say-die, help-builders-build, overthrow-tyrants attitude of @Euler__Lagrange from opacity and the entrepreneurial spirit of @ArynChadha from Earnifi. ————————- Call to action Eigenlayer powers verifiability of arbitrary claims. Opacity powers private verifiability of all password-protected content.
Come build the user-owned internet with us!
item.dc:creator: @sreeramkannan
item.description:
Eigenlayer: taking crypto mainstream!
————————-
Earnifi
The #5 Finance App in the App Store.
@OpacityNetwork ♾️ @eigenlayer
————————-
Problem
I am a regular worker and want an advance.
————————-
Today
Predatory pay day loans
————————-
Solution
Prove to the lender that the borrower receives x wages regularly (=genuine)
————————-
Unlock
Opacity provides powerful primtives for anyone to prove arbitrary claims about their bank account with privacy!
————————-
Community
This is made possible by the never-say-die, help-builders-build, overthrow-tyrants attitude of @Euler__Lagrange from opacity and the entrepreneurial spirit of @ArynChadha from Earnifi.
————————-
Call to action
Eigenlayer powers verifiability of arbitrary claims. Opacity powers private verifiability of all password-protected content.

Come build the user-owned internet with us!
